gnat.preprocessing
Class PorterStemmerEN

java.lang.Object
  gnat.preprocessing.PorterStemmerEN

public class PorterStemmerEN
extends java.lang.Object

A Stemmer for English using the Porter stemming algorithm.

[1] M.F. Porter, 1980, An algorithm for suffix stripping, Program, 14(3) pp 130-137.
[2] Karen Sparck Jones and Peter Willet, 1997, Readings in Information Retrieval, San Francisco: Morgan Kaufmann, ISBN 1-55860-454-4.

See http://www.tartarus.org/~martin/PorterStemmer/

Author:
Martin Porter ;-), Conrad Plake, Joerg Hakenberg
